org.apache.gearpump.streaming.task

Interface TaskInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountTriggerTask, DataSinkTask, DataSourceTask, EventTimeTriggerTask, OpSpec.AnyTask, PersistentTask, PlannerSpec.AnyTask, ProcessingTimeTriggerTask, StreamSpec.Join, SubscriptionSpec.NextTask, Task, Task, TaskA, TaskB, TaskLauncherSpec.MockTask, TaskManagerSpec.Task1, TaskManagerSpec.Task2, TaskSchedulerSpec.TestTask1, TaskSchedulerSpec.TestTask2, TaskWrapper, TransformTask

    public interface TaskInterface
    Streaming Task interface

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        void onStart(java.time.Instant startTime)
        Method called with the task is initialized.
        Parameters:
        startTime - startTime that can be used to decide from when a source producer task should replay the data source, or from when a processor task should recover its checkpoint data in to in-memory state.

      • onNext

        void onNext(Message msg)
        Method called for each message received.

        Parameters:
        msg - Message send by upstream tasks

      • onStop

        void onStop()
        Method called when task is under clean up.

        This can be used to cleanup resource when the application finished.

      • receiveUnManagedMessage

        scala.PartialFunction<java.lang.Object,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> receiveUnManagedMessage()
        Handlers unmanaged messages

        Returns:
        the handler

      • onWatermarkProgress

        void onWatermarkProgress(java.time.Instant watermark)
        Method called on watermark update. Usually safe to output or checkpoint states earlier than watermark.

        Parameters:
        watermark - represents event time progress.
